message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.COMM, cs.SY, cs.MM

The paper deals with the design of linear precoding for multibeam satellite systems, which involves optimization of data rate and power allocation with linear and nonlinear constraints. This falls under the domain of information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also discusses communication aspects of the system, such as co-polarization and dual-polarization antennas, which further supports the inclusion of cs.COMM (communication and networking) as a likely sub-category. The iterative algorithm proposed in the paper involves optimization of multiple parameters, which can be seen as a control systems problem, thus making cs.SY (systems and control) another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper includes simulation results that involve multimedia traffic, which could potentially place it under cs.MM (multimedia).
